verses.verse: Even to day<WH3117> is my complaint<WH7879> bitter<WH4805>: my stroke<WH3027> is heavier<WH3513> than my groaning<WH585>.
Oh that<WH5414> I knew<WH3045> where I might find<WH4672> him<WH935>! that I might come even to his seat<WH8499>!
I would order<WH6186> my cause<WH4941> before<WH6440> him<WH4390>, and fill my mouth<WH6310> with arguments<WH8433>.
I would know<WH3045> the words<WH4405> which he would answer<WH6030> me<WH995>, and understand what he would say unto me<WH559>.
Will he plead<WH7378> against<WH5978> me with his great<WH7230> power<WH3581>? No<WH7760>; but he would put strength in me.
There the righteous<WH3477> might dispute<WH3198> with him<WH6403>; so should I be delivered for ever<WH5331> from my judge<WH8199>.
Behold<WH1980>, I go forward<WH6924>, but he is not there<WH268>; and backward, but I cannot perceive him<WH995>:
On the left hand<WH8040>, where he does work<WH6213>, but I cannot behold<WH2372> him<WH5848>: he hides himself on the right hand<WH3225>, that I cannot see him<WH7200>:
But he knows<WH3045> the way<WH1870> that I take<WH5978>: when he has tried<WH974> me<WH3318>, I shall come forth as gold<WH2091>.
My foot<WH7272> has held<WH270> his steps<WH838>, his way<WH1870> have I kept<WH8104>, and not declined<WH5186>.
Neither have I gone back<WH4185> from the commandment<WH4687> of his lips<WH8193>; I have esteemed<WH6845> the words<WH561> of his mouth<WH6310> more than my necessary food<WH2706>.
But he is in one<WH259> mind<WH7725>, and who can turn him<WH5315>? and what his soul desires<WH183>, even that he does<WH6213>.
For he performs<WH7999> the thing that is appointed<WH2706> for me<WH7227>: and many such things are with him<WH2007>.
Therefore am I troubled<WH926> at his presence<WH6440>: when I consider<WH995>, I am afraid of him<WH6342>.
For God<WH410> makes my heart<WH3820> soft<WH7401>, and the Almighty<WH7706> troubles me<WH926>:
Because I was not cut off<WH6789> before<WH6440> the darkness<WH2822>, neither has he covered<WH3680> the darkness<WH652> from my face<WH6440>.
